ValidationRule.description: Give error message if there is no sales order number before you close the case.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $RecordType.Name = 'Orders' , ISPICKVAL( Type , 'Place Order') , ISBLANK( Sales_Order_Number__c ) , ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Done'),$Profile.Name <> $Label.API_data_Load_Profile )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter sales order number before you close the case.
